import axios from 'axios' import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' function UpdateUser() { const {id} = useParams() const [name, setName] = useState() const [age, setAge] = useState() const [email, setEmail] = useState() const navigate = useNavigate() useEffect(()=> { axios.get('http://localhost:3001/getUser/'+id) .then(result => {console.log(result) setName(result.data.name) }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) },[]) return (

Update User

) } export default UpdateUser
